definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: The digestive system of 45 day-old abalone Haliotis discus hannai Ino is studied by histological method.
sentences.chinese: 以组织学方法研究了45日龄皱纹盘鲍的消化系统。

sentences.english: It was fabulous. And we even got digestives to help keep us healthy.
sentences.chinese: 酒店还给了我们消化系统的药，保证我们健康。

sentences.english: Also, probiotics and magnesium vitamins often help keep your body on a healthy, digestive roll.
sentences.chinese: 益生菌和镁维生素使你的消化系统顺畅健康地运作。

sentences.english: The amount of collagen that is absorbed through the digestive system is "extremely little.
sentences.chinese: 通过消化系统吸收的胶原蛋白量是极小的。

sentences.english: The body can take quite a bit of other bacteria in our ingestion.
sentences.chinese: 我们的消化系统是可以平静的接受一些细菌的。

sentences.english: The Population poisoned from entering the digestive system, such as trichlorfon , and so on.
sentences.chinese: 经虫口进入其消化系统起毒杀作用，如敌百虫等。

sentences.english: This paper reports the anatomical and histological characters of digestive system of Onychodatylus fischeri.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了爪鲵消化系统的形态学和组织学结构特点。

sentences.english: Consumption of peppermint leaf or mint tea also helps the digestive system regenerate in the physical.
sentences.chinese: 食用欧薄荷叶或薄荷茶，也帮助身体的消化系统再生。

sentences.english: The results showed that the digestive system is composed of fore-gut, mid-gut, hind-gut and digestive gland.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，克氏螯虾消化系统包括消化道和消化腺。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the early diagnosis and treatment of digestive tract carcinoids.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨消化系统类癌的早期诊断及治疗。

sentences.english: Objective It is to discuss the relation between digestive system malignant tumor and osteopenia of elderly people.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨消化系统恶性肿瘤与老年人骨量减少的关系。

sentences.english: In our study, we also found that mirror-like tongue can appear in malignant tumor patients who are in advanced stage.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果亦表明消化系统恶性肿瘤更易出现镜面舌象。

sentences.english: The digestive system of caridina denticulata was studied with light microscopy in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 运用光镜技术研究了锯齿米虾的消化系统。

sentences.english: Have a glass of water and perhaps try a dash of herbal aloe juice which is wonderfully soothing to the digestive system.
sentences.chinese: 喝一杯水或者一点点可以顺畅消化系统的芦荟汁。

sentences.english: Under normal circumstances this injurious influence is reduced in the gut system by specific amine oxidases.
sentences.chinese: 在正常状况下这些迫害感化会因消化系统而降低。
